column4: I loaded edubuntu on an 8gb flash drive and i can boot from it and everything but it won't let me update packages.  Says not enough room.  But it looks like there is.
Do I have to allocate more room
can you give a pastebin of the output of: dpkg -l | grep linux-image    Thanks
press CTRL+ALT+T and paste the comamnd there, copy the output and go to http://pastie.org  paste the text there and hit paste. When the page changes copy the address bar and paste THAT here
